details.regulation: The Food Allergen Labeling and Consumer Protection Act of 2004 (FALCPA)
details.article: Section 403(w) of the FD&C Act (amended by FASTER Act of 2021)
details.reason: Requires clear labeling of major food allergens on packaged foods.
details.note: The list of major allergens was expanded from 8 to 9 by the FASTER Act, adding Sesame, effective January 1, 2023.

details.article: Section 403(w) of the FD&C Act (amended by FASTER Act of 2021)
